credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: figure study for a fountain design
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
medium: black crayon, white chalk, on buff paper
description: Vertical rectangle. The nude figure of a boy, standing, turned toward the right. The arms are uplifted. The boy's left hand incompletely indicated. Suggestion of basin on boy's head. Anatomical drawing of figure, right.
name: Drawing
